reviews.review: Tüm zamanların en iyisi. Yalnız vuruş hissiyatı biraz daha iyi olabilirdi, remaster bekliyoruz bir de. :)

Великолепная игра, даже в 2022 году игра ощущается всё так же хорошо. Если вы не разу не проходили серию Half Life, то рекомендую купить orange box по скидке за сущие копейки (по мимо самой Half Life в него входят Portal; Half Life Episode 1,2; Half Life 2 Lost Coast; Half Life Deathmatch и такой же deathmatch, но на движке Source. Интересные достижения, которые, как ни странно, интересно открывать. СОВЕТУЮ ВООБЩЕ ПРОЙТИ ВСЮ СЕРИЮ HALF LIFE

Half Life realmente es más que una obra maestra, es un antes y después en la historia de los juegos. Una franquicia cuyo propósito real parece ser sentar los cimientos de lo que van a ser los juegos en un futuro. La historia es misteriosa y atrapante, los desafíos son simples pero entretenidos. Los personajes son ideales para la trama. Incluso para estándares modernos, es un juego %100 disfrutable.
From what I've played so far, Half-Life 2 is an utter joy. Play it.
Игра потрясающая и очень интересная но иногда можно испугатся.
foda quando percebe q a gente fez tudo isso só pra fuder de novo, e ainda sim não fodemos.

В давние времена, эта игра обошла меня стороной. В детстве видел, как брат проходит её, но не обратил должного внимания.

И вот уговорил себя пройти всю серию и очень сильно пожалел... пожалел, что не прошёл раньше!

По сравнению с первой частью - здесь больше сюжета, а сюжет довольно интересен. Уверен, если бы меня усадили за неё в детстве - возлюбил бы как сталкер, так как в игре много тира и отличная атмосфера. Сейчас же не так весело, крушить искусственный интеллект уже не доставляет удовольствия.

Теперь понимаю людей, которые ждут выхода третьей части.
Игра детства рад снова в неё поиграть захватывающий и интересный сюжет

Обожаю эту игру, говорить что-то насчёт сюжета я не буду. Люблю проходить модификации в этой крутой игре.

1. БАГИ
2. БАГИ
3. БАГИ
4. БАГИ
5. БАГИ
6. Надоедливые союзники которые мешают передвигаться, а когда нужна их помощь - они мертвы.
7. БАГИ
8. БАГИ
9. БАГИ
10. Наитупейшая Аликс, которые вызывала только ненависть и всем видом показывала свою бесполезность.
11. Сначало проходил игру, разглядывая каждый уровень. Но после 7 главы уже перестал вдаваться в сюжет(типичный молчаливый физик мочит полчища зомби, элитные отряды Альянса, прекрасно общается со всеми видами оружия и абсолютно каждый нейтральный или дружественный NPC боготворят Гордона Фримена), поэтому просто бежал напрополую, чтобы быстрее закончить компанию. Но нет, у меня сгорело сидалище, удалил этот "шедевр" и никогда больше не вернусь к этому...

第一次通关，一共用了大概17个小时，三天时间。这次半条命2(准确的来说应该是半衰期2）还是给我带来了惊喜，这次半条命2在前作的基础上又进行了大大的改善，尤其是在难度上，半条命2的难度明显要比半条命1的难度要低很多。而且在画质上也有很大的提升，半条命2的画质和物理引擎很难让人想象到这是一个18年前诞生的游戏。相反在晚于半条命2四年出现的国产游戏穿越火线的画质确是和半条命1相差无几，而在玩法上也只是和CS一样，只是加了个充钱系统，可以买各种更厉害的武器，抄了CS的地图和玩法，却没有像CS一样的公平性，在我看来穿越火线能火是因为当时那个年代中国引进的优秀游戏都太少了，而且都很难接触到那些好玩的游戏再加上中国玩家人傻钱多，纵而导致了穿越火线能火而在往后的好几年里诞生了许许多多的国产FPS游戏，但都和穿越火线如出一辙，甚至可以说是一个模子里出来的。由此可以看出国产游戏的卑微。再回到正题上谈半条命2的游玩心得:
1.游戏的画质和剧情都很赞并且都远超前一代，不愧是游戏史上最伟大的FPS之一
2.在这里我想送给第一次玩并且追求完美喜欢收藏成就的玩家一个忠告：玩之前一定要看看成就指南，别像我只顾着肝游戏进度，而不管成就。等通关回过头来在想去肝成就时，傻眼了，很多成就还得重新过一遍游戏，尤其是找隐藏图标的成就，回过头来去找只能重头再来，我在完成这个成就时剩下两个实在找不到了便忍痛放弃了，算是一个小小的遗憾吧，等以后有时间了在通一边关，去完成那个成就吧。
在最后我想说:造成国产FPS游戏今天这种局面的不是别人正是我们中国玩家自己，都是我们当年惯的那些游戏，所以从现在开始抵制垃圾FPS游戏从我做起。

this game is such a good game i love it

This is, and I am serious this times, a masterpiece only rivalled by the follow-ups.

Good guns, incredible atmosphere, lore could be called the Bible II.

I remember playing the demo and meeting a headcrab zombie for the first time (God I was scared to death), and not knowing how to use any of the guns. When I played the full game up to that point, it felt like finally being tall enough for a theme park ride that you have wanted to ride on for ages. What I mean by this, is that you are given adequate time to learn each and every weapon, even if it includes pointing, clicking and hoping. 

The story was the type that had me read hours of the Half-Life wiki and watch entire lore readings on Youtube. With memorable characters like Barney (still owes me a beer), Alyx (can do Assassin's Creed parkour), Kleiner (finds turkey-sized parasites cute), Eli (wants grandkids), Mossman (ok maybe not that good) and Breen (I would vote for him). The G-Man is by far my favourite.

The Source Engine really forms the feeling of Eastern Europe/Bulgaria (where the game is set) and makes the environment not only look, but feel, real. 

What this game achieves is, by video game standards (heck, even higher), being a genuinely good game. 

Now go ahead and invade Alcatraz with the help of an alien testicle!

Que se puede decir que no esté dicho sobre HL2, lejos el mejor juego de su generación, un adelantado a su época, una obra maestra en todos sus aspectos, la IA, la música, la historia, los personajes, el combate, los efectos de sonido, todo, absolutamente funciona perfecto en este, y en toda la saga HL. Es un 10/10, no se compara con nada.

Lo gané hoy, por 25/01/22, de una sentada, 6 horas seguidas, por 12va vez, el único juego que gané tantas e incansables veces, en diferentes computadoras, lamentablemente cuando lo descubrí, fue pirateado, por eso vuelvo a ganarlo completo, porque se lo merece. Siguen los episodios uno y dos, y devuelta este, pero la update :)

Amazing sequel to the original masterpiece. This is how all sequels should be like. 
Even though the original was revolutionary for fps games, HL2 has its fair share of mechanics that fps, action, adventure and puzzle games make use of today. 
Finally, the graphics are unreal for a 2004 game. It is astonishing how well this game holds up, even for today's standards. 
If you have not played this game, do so asap, you won't regret it :)

I liked this less than black mesa but it was still a solid game, best FPS I have ever played and one of the better stories, which build up for the episodes, leaving you wanting for more, it was a great game.

What's there to say about Half-Life 2 that hasn't already been said?
The game is legendary, i think even more legendary than the previous games of the series. Although the graphics haven't aged extremely well (and still were not cutting-edge by 2004), the gameplay and its mechanics make the base for one of the best storytelling FPS adventures out there.

Up to this day, i have never played a better time-weighted game, where you're not spending too much time in the same environment or the opposite. The idea to use havoc's physics engine as a weapon with the gravity gun was total genius and the visual storytelling of each level was spot-on: Seeing the effects of the combine invasion in the city areas and even more in the coastal and canal areas makes up for interesting nature-construction environments, and the rotten town of Ravenholm, once lived by workers, now infected by all sorts of headcrabs, creates one of the best horror scenarios of the whole FPS scene, with its dim lighting, almost entirely used to lead the player to its objectives and not to just brighten the play area.

The mix of polished content and uncut beta assets makes a developer-side analysis of the game much more interesting, no wonder why there's such a healthy and durable part of the community that, still today, after 18 years, takes so much care in rebuilding each piece together and finding out the history of scrapped features. Not to mention, the beta content used in Ravenholm only makes the game more eerie and unsettling, with low detailing that leaves the player to wonder or with unexpected and unidentifiable sounds coming from all parts.

The game features one of the most arcadey styles of combat, with a wide variety of weapons, the iconic crowbar, if you run out of ammo, and the innovative gravity gun if you simply want to wreck stuff and have fun. If that doesn't suit your fighting style, there's loads of mods that enhance or change entirely the way the game plays. MMod, for example, adds multiple polishings to the game, such as reworked particle and visual effects, ironsight features, new viewmodel animations, new weapons and a multitude of other toggleable changes. If you're going for something more sillier or simply different, sites like gamebanana are out there for you to explore.

This game signifies the debut of Valve into the Source engine, underlooked nowadays, but incredibly capable if worked with properly. Its spaghetti code only limits the performance, but the accessibility renders it a viable choice for entry-level developers, as it's been in the past for a huge multitude of games.
With it came legendary official games like Left 4 Dead, Team Fortress 2 and the Portal series, as well as so called "sourcemods" like Garry's Mod, Insurgency and Fistful of Frags.
Hundreds, if not thousands of other sourcemods have spawned as games with similar gameplay mechanics, using the game's features with different stories and campaigns.
If the game already satisfies you as it is, but sounds repetitive and boring after 18 years, Synergy is on the steam market for free, to allow you to replay the game with your friends in Coop modes.
Overall, this game has shown how much a Graphics engine is able to become a meme and a shared workspace for multiple types of development.
